snippet: The Atlantic menhaden is rarely eaten by humans, but for the Atlantic ecosystem as well as commercial and recreational fisherman, it is vital.
abstract: Regulators vote to reduce allowable commercial harvest of Atlantic menhaden by 20 percent, placing broad catch limit on critical fishery that has until now been largely unregulated.
lead_paragraph: The Atlantic menhaden is rarely eaten by humans, but for the Atlantic ecosystem as well as commercial and recreational fisherman, it is vital.

headline.seo: Catch Limits Put on Menhaden, Unglamorous but Crucial Fish
headline.main: Broad Catch Limits Are Put on an Unglamorous but Essential Fish
headline.print_headline: Broad Catch Limits Are Put on Menhaden, an Unglamorous but Essential Fish
